metadata.name: We are burning
metadata.description:
On 06.04.2022, a 60 acres standing wheat crop was gutted in Kharasara village, Ballia, UP, India. 
A spark was created due to rubbing of parts of the chaff making machine, and the crop allegedly caught fire. People from different villages ran & they tried to put out the fire with the help of buckets & tree branches. Fire brigade reached the spot late. A wheat crop cultivated by very poor families was reduced to ashes. People from different families started to cry and got depressed, and a few fainted and were admitted to hospital by villagers.
